articles.title: A top London law firm is allowing dogs in the office to reduce stress
articles.description: Slaughter & May is trialing a new dog-friendly policy at its London offices that lets lawyers bring pets to work once a month, The Telegraph reports.
articles.content:
One of London's oldest and most prestigious law firm is letting lawyers bring their dogs to work amid an increasingly ferocious war for top legal talent.

articles.title: Dogecoin spikes after Elon Musk says he'll keep buying it
articles.description: The coin, heavily championed by the Tesla founder, has lost two-thirds of its value since the start of the year amid a wider crypto selloff.
